概述  软件包   类  使用  树  已过时  索引  帮助 
 上一个类   下一个类 框架    无框架    
摘要： 嵌套 | 字段 | 构造方法 | 方法 详细信息： 字段 | 构造方法 | 方法

game
类 Game

java.lang.Object
  game.Game

public class Game
extends java.lang.Object

Class processing the main logic of AI agent

作者：
yuanduochen

字段摘要
 State game_state
           
static int NEGINFINITY
           
static int POSINFINITY
           
 
构造方法摘要
Game(int level, int first)
          construct function of Game class initialize the parameters: level of AI and who go first
 
方法摘要
static State getResult(State pre, Action act, int playerNo)
          function that return a state after the given action
 Action makeDecision()
          main function processing the alpha beta search return an action that AI agent choose
 int maxValue(State state, Action act, int alpha, int beta, int depth)
          maxValue function determine the best action taken by AI agent
 int minValue(State state, Action act, int alpha, int beta, int depth)
          minValue function determine the best action taken by opposite
 Result play(Action act)
          method called by the upper level given an action player choose give a result including the statue of game and a decision AI agent make
 
从类 java.lang.Object 继承的方法
equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

字段详细信息

POSINFINITY

public static int POSINFINITY

NEGINFINITY

public static int NEGINFINITY

game_state

public State game_state
构造方法详细信息

Game

public Game(int level,
            int first)
construct function of Game class initialize the parameters: level of AI and who go first

参数：
level - the level of AI
first - determine who go first
方法详细信息

play

public Result play(Action act)
method called by the upper level given an action player choose give a result including the statue of game and a decision AI agent make

参数：
act - the action that player take
返回：
a Result class contain the type of result and action AI takes if the player does not win

getResult

public static State getResult(State pre,
                              Action act,
                              int playerNo)
function that return a state after the given action

参数：
pre - the state before the action take
act - action taken by the player or the AI agent
playerNo - a flag that mark if the player is human or AI agent
返回：
a state transfered by the previous state after taking the action

makeDecision

public Action makeDecision()
main function processing the alpha beta search return an action that AI agent choose

返回：
return an action that the AI agent determines by alpha-beta search

minValue

public int minValue(State state,
                    Action act,
                    int alpha,
                    int beta,
                    int depth)
minValue function determine the best action taken by opposite

参数：
state - the state before taking the action to reach this level
act - the action taken to reach this level
alpha - the value of alpha in the search algorithm
beta - the value of beta in the search algorithm
depth - used to record which depth reached
返回：
a value of v in the search algorithm

maxValue

public int maxValue(State state,
                    Action act,
                    int alpha,
                    int beta,
                    int depth)
maxValue function determine the best action taken by AI agent

参数：
state - the state before taking the action to reach this level
act - the action taken to reach this level
alpha - the value of alpha in the search algorithm
beta - the value of beta in the search algorithm
depth - used to record which depth reached
返回：
a value of v in the search algorithm
